title: How to Find Edgar's Chainsaw in Final Fantasy VI

steps.headline: Go under the metal rafters.
steps.description: Take a left near the cafe. You must do this the first time you visit Zozo.

steps.headline: Go up on the first corner next to the cafe.
steps.description: Keep walking until you see the inn.

steps.headline: Head inside the inn.
steps.description: You'll see a clock that needs to be reset. Since you don't know the time you'll have to head back out the city and ask around.

steps.headline: Head for the house at the lower left side of the cafe.
steps.description: Talk to the man behind the bar, and he'll tell you that there definitely isn't a girl at the rooftop of the building.

steps.headline: Go upstairs to the second floor.
steps.description: You'll see a line of men walking toward the next room; talk to each and everyone of them and take note of the times that they tell you.

steps.headline: Go behind the largest tower in Zozo.
steps.description: You'll be able to enter another house with a man standing behind a bar; talk to him, and he'll say that his clock has no minute hands and it's always pointing the wrong way.

steps.headline: Go near the clock in this room and examine it.
steps.description: Your character will comment that it's pointing at two.

steps.headline: Head to the top of the tower.
steps.description: You'll see a man - talk to him. He'll say that the seconds are all divisible by 20—take note of this.

steps.headline: Head to the cafe near the entrance of Zozo.
steps.description: Talk to the owner, and he'll say that the second hand is at 30.

steps.headline: Examine the clock again.
steps.description: Head back to the Inn and look at the clock. Now that you have all the clues needed for the puzzle, it's time to open the door and access the clock.

steps.headline: Enter 6:00 when the clock asks for the hour.
steps.description: Previously you asked a bunch of men what time it was, and they answered "2:00," "12:00," "4:00," "8:00," and "10:00." The pattern of numbers given is based on a two hour time difference. With that in mind, it's noticeable that there is a number in that pattern missing - "6:00." Enter the number into the clock.

steps.headline: Enter 10:00 for the minutes.
steps.description: The man behind the tower told you that his clock doesn't have a minute hand and that it always points to the wrong time. Since he was lying, it's safe to assume that the clock pointing at 2 is correct; since 2 means 10 minutes on a clock, the answer is 10:00.

steps.headline: Enter 50 for the seconds.
steps.description: This one is a bit tough; you already know that it isn't divisible by 20 because of the man on the tower, which eliminates 20, 40, and 60. Another man informed you that it's 30, but since he was lying, it's not 30. Now you're left with 10 or 50. Try both 10 and 50 and see which one works. In this case, 50 will be correct. Entering "6:10:50" into the clock will open a portion of the wall on the right side of the room. Climb up the stairs and open the chest to receive Edgar's chainsaw weapon.

text: Finding the Clock in Zozo Go under the metal rafters. Take a left near the cafe. You must do this the first time you visit Zozo. Go up on the first corner next to the cafe. Keep walking until you see the inn. Head inside the inn. You'll see a clock that needs to be reset. Since you don't know the time you'll have to head back out the city and ask around. Searching for Clues Head for the house at the lower left side of the cafe. Talk to the man behind the bar, and he'll tell you that there definitely isn't a girl at the rooftop of the building. Go upstairs to the second floor. You'll see a line of men walking toward the next room; talk to each and everyone of them and take note of the times that they tell you. Go behind the largest tower in Zozo. You'll be able to enter another house with a man standing behind a bar; talk to him, and he'll say that his clock has no minute hands and it's always pointing the wrong way. Go near the clock in this room and examine it. Your character will comment that it's pointing at two. Head to the top of the tower. You'll see a man - talk to him. He'll say that the seconds are all divisible by 20—take note of this. Head to the cafe near the entrance of Zozo. Talk to the owner, and he'll say that the second hand is at 30. Getting the Chainsaw Examine the clock again. Head back to the Inn and look at the clock. Now that you have all the clues needed for the puzzle, it's time to open the door and access the clock. Enter 6:00 when the clock asks for the hour. Previously you asked a bunch of men what time it was, and they answered "2:00," "12:00," "4:00," "8:00," and "10:00." The pattern of numbers given is based on a two hour time difference. With that in mind, it's noticeable that there is a number in that pattern missing - "6:00." Enter the number into the clock. Enter 10:00 for the minutes. The man behind the tower told you that his clock doesn't have a minute hand and that it always points to the wrong time. Since he was lying, it's safe to assume that the clock pointing at 2 is correct; since 2 means 10 minutes on a clock, the answer is 10:00. Enter 50 for the seconds. This one is a bit tough; you already know that it isn't divisible by 20 because of the man on the tower, which eliminates 20, 40, and 60. Another man informed you that it's 30, but since he was lying, it's not 30. Now you're left with 10 or 50. Try both 10 and 50 and see which one works. In this case, 50 will be correct. Entering "6:10:50" into the clock will open a portion of the wall on the right side of the room. Climb up the stairs and open the chest to receive Edgar's chainsaw weapon.
